headline: Ask HN: Best Online Associate's Degree in CS, and is it worth it?
description:
(First post on HN, hello world)

TL;DR - New Developer looking for the best online Associate's degree in Computer Science for the sake of getting better at Development, and having something nice on paper

I am currently an AS400/COBOL dev that was originally trained in an 11 month web-development boot camp. During that span, I taught myself enough COBOL to get a position near my hometown. I started my "coding journey" in August 2020 shortly after high school, and have been in my current (and first) position since September 2021.

While lots of progress has been made through books, YT tutorials, some projects on my own time, and the occasional project at my work, I want to know what my best resources would be if I wanted to dedicate myself to a 2 year college degree, and if those gains would be any stronger than what I'm doing now. I'm also in such a niche space in a rural state that I don't know how much of a requirement this would be in a remote space.

Any information on my situation or good resources is appreciated.
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 最好的在线CS副学位，是否值得？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 最好的在線CS副學位，是否值得？
description_zh-Hans:
(First post on HN, hello world)

TL;DR - New Developer looking for the best online Associate's degree in Computer Science for getting better at Development, and having something nice on paper

I am currently an AS400/COBOL dev that was originally trained in an 11 months web-development boot camp. 在这期间，我自学了足够的COBOL，以便在我的家乡附近获得一个职位。我于2020年8月高中毕业后不久开始了我的"编码之旅"，并于2021年9月开始担任我目前（也是第一个）职位。

虽然通过书籍、YT教程、我自己的一些项目以及工作中偶尔的项目取得了很多进展，但我想知道如果我想致力于两年的大学学位，我的最佳资源会是什么，以及这些收获是否会比我现在所做的更多。我也在一个农村州的这样一个小众空间里，我不知道这在一个偏远的空间里会有多大的要求。

感谢任何关于我的情况或良好资源的信息。
description_zh-Hant:
(First post on HN, hello world)

TL;DR - New Developer looking for the best online Associate's degree in Computer Science for getting better at Development, and having something nice on paper

I am currently an AS400/COBOL dev that was originally trained in an 11 months web-development boot camp. 在這期間，我自學了足夠的COBOL，以便在我的家鄉附近獲得一個職位。我於2020年8月高中畢業後不久開始了我的"編碼之旅"，並於2021年9月開始擔任我目前（也是第一個）職位。

雖然通過書籍、YT教程、我自己的一些項目以及工作中偶爾的項目取得了很多進展，但我想知道如果我想致力於兩年的大學學位，我的最佳資源會是什麼，以及這些收穫是否會比我現在所做的更多。我也在一個農村州的這樣一個小眾空間裡，我不知道這在一個偏遠的空間裡會有多大的要求。

感謝任何關於我的情況或良好資源的信息。
